home.title: Home
home.maincontent1: After many delays and a lot of reorganising, we're very excited to finally invite you to join us on our Wedding day!
home.maincontent2: From this site, you'll be able to view {link to='/information' text='information'} about the day and the {link to='/location' text='location'}.
home.maincontent3: You can head over to the {link to='/rsvp' text='RSVP'} page to let us know if you can make it. Please also use this page to let us know of any dietary requirements you have.
home.maincontent4: You'll also be able to see the images from the day on the {link to='/pictures' text='Pictures'} page once they become available. Have a look around by opening the menu at the top.
home.giftsmessage1: The most important thing to us is that you can make it to celebrate our Wedding day with us, we do not expect any gifts from anyone.
home.giftsmessage2: However, we do understand that some of you may want to give us a gift. If you do want to give us something, we would greatly appreciate a small contribution towards our Honeymoon, the greatest gifts we could ask for are great memories and experiences together as a new family.
home.giftsmessage3: To make things easier, we've set up a CollectionPot, {link to='https://www.collectionpot.com/pot/1034776/' text='which you can find here'}, any contribution is greatly appreciated!

info.title: Information
info.timethree: Bar opens and canapés are served
info.timefour: Guests take seats for Wedding breakfast
info.timeseven: Evening guests will begin to arrive
info.timeeight: Cake cutting followed by First Dance and band
info.foodinfo: Canapés will be served before the ceremony.
info.foodevening: In the evening, there will be a selection of freshly made pizzas.
info.hotelinfo: There are a lot of hotels within a 10-15 drive from the venue if you don't feel like making the journey home on the night!
info.bandinfo: JukeboxMK will be performing in the evening, they're a great band and do a massive variety of genres. JukeboxMK will be doing three 45-minute sets, with a DJ in between. {link to='https://www.jukeboxmk.com/' text='You can find their website here'}.
info.bandinfolink: You can find there website here
info.songrequests: Got some songs you'd like to hear? Leave them below

location.title: Location
location.locationdescription: Location Desciption - Just off the M1 blah blah

images.title: Pictures
images.maincontent: Once the Wedding photos are available, we'll let everyone know and you'll be able to view them here.
